duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care in a long-term acute care setting, focusing on the unique needs of chronically critically ill patients.
Utilize critical thinking to assess, plan, implement, and evaluate patient care.
Administer medications and treatments as prescribed by the physician.
Work in the medical-surgical unit, providing care to patients with complex conditions.
Adhere to long-term care standards and protocols, ensuring the well-being of patients under extended medical supervision.
Maintain ACLS and BLS certifications, responding to emergency situations with competence and efficiency.
Document patient care using electronic medical record (EMR) systems, ensuring accuracy and completeness.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing (BSN) and RN licensure
